Text: I will seed for another hour then those that have the file should continue seeding. I have seeded about 93 copies already.

Good upload. Thanks to uploader.

If yall have trouble opening this file, just know that Mozilla FireFox has an addon called "LUCIFOX". It is an .epub reader and will work just fine. Once installed, you may drag and drop the .epub file into the browser. Simple as that and then some (read the user manual that comes with it). I do not know of any other non-browser .epub readers though.

As fer the eBook... Hmmm. Will keep reading it. Interesting. Will seed.

Hey The_BLaCK_ReDNeCK, did you try Calibre? Not only can you read almost every format but you can convert them too.
